Was close to the hotel, so we tried it on a whim (usually I plan things out fairly carefully, but didn't expect so much down time before we could check in to the hotel). I suppose there is a reason I try to plan things out ... to avoid places like this. The servers were very friendly. But the fried items were too oily (calamari and chipirones, the octopus was bland. The tortilla de patatas was good, as was the grilled langostines.
